WorkItem.Description:
I didn't manually add any items to the XML files, but I did add items to the database (using normal Add item feature) that don't have proper IDs. This hasn't been an issue in the past, so I'm not sure what item went wrong.

Comments.Message: Don't know if it has anything to do with that crash, but the first obvious thing is that you're using an old version. 2.2.1 is latest.

If there's anything item specific it would have to be head slot since that's what is shown first by default. In any case you'll have to attach the character xml where this happens and if you can item cache also.
